medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began at 3pm. The patient was recently discharged after a prolonged hospital course for NSTEMI, CHF, and respiratory failure and now returns to the ED.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary artery disease - s/p CABG (LIMA-D1, SVG-LAD, SVG-OM1, SVG-RPDA), LVEF >55%, Hypertension, Dyslipidemia, Mild aortic stenosis, Diastolic CHF, Post-op A.fib, DJD, Breast Ca s/p lumpectomy
medical_history.family_history: No family h/o early cardiac death, arrhythmias
